newsitem.title: USA: U.S. weekly hog/corn, steer/corn ratio -- USDA.
newsitem.headline: U.S. weekly hog/corn, steer/corn ratio -- USDA.

text.p: The U.S. hog/corn ratio for the week ended Sept 7 was 14.0 versus 13.0 in the previous week and 17.4 in the corresponding week a year ago, the U.S. Agriculture Department said.
The steer/corn ratio in the week was 18.1 versus 14.8 in the previous week and 21.9 in the year-ago week.
The ratio represents the number of bushels of corn that can be bought at Omaha for 100 lbs of hog or steer.
